parameters:
\N<Training Troops Receptionist>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>

\N<Segi>Oh, I have come to the training session as a substitute for
my husband Yuia... My name is Segi, his wife...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmm... I've heard the story. Today is your first battle,
isn't it? I must commend you for not running away despite
being a woman.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>As you may know, in order to fight on the stage of the
training session, you'll need to process a temporary
exemption from your husband Yuia's charges. Present the
relevant documents.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Segi>...Please take care of this.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmm, the match will start soon. But you can't fight as you
are now. First, change into a warrior's outfit and move to
the waiting room.
\N<Segi>That outfit...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Are you dissatisfied? Indeed, for you as a woman, that is
nothing but humiliation. I can understand that.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>But what is your role? Is it to protect your chastity at all
costs? Or is it to survive this training session by any
means necessary?
\N<Segi>That is...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>If your determination is real, then exposing your skin to
the public eye should be considered a trivial matter. Am I
wrong?
\N<Segi>You may be right... perhaps.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>However... I can more than guess your feelings. And the
effect of the Mind Lyuda might soon bare its fangs within
you.
\N<Segi>Fangs within me...? What do you mean?

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>...That is not something for me to speak of. You will
receive instructions from Lord Zuuteruka later on.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Besides, looking at your expression, it's clear. You're
aware of the symptoms yourself, aren't you?

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Growing day by day... Upon arriving here, did you not feel
as if your soul was being captured?
\N<Segi>...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>That said... It's not as if your soul has actually been
captured.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Make sure your determination and readiness do not lose to
the erosion of that spiritual medicine. Strengthen your
heart and prepare well.
\N<Segi>Ah, thank you very much...
セギ02
face01

B

\N<Segi>...I can't run away. For Lord Yuia... for Riia. I have to do
this...

\N<Man>...

\N<Man>Tch... You're so cheeky... If your mother wasn't here, I'd
have kicked you down already.
6_セギ06a

\N<Man>Heh, well yeah. Can't really do that in front of Miss Segi,
now can we?

\N<Man>Aah... You think you're protecting your mother? You're a
real cheeky brat.

The men stared at Segi's body from the bottom of the stairs,
their gazes licking over her persistently, filled with a
certain expectation they were eagerly awaiting.
\N<Man>Tch... Just my luck. We were so close...

The man glared at Segi's hands holding her clothes and
clicked his tongue in disgust.

\N<Man>Don't rush, it's all good. The path to the audience seats
ahead is open-air, after all. The chance will come. Let's
enjoy the view patiently, shall we?
6_セギ06b
\N<Man>Oh... huh?
\N<Man>Hehe... See? Wasn't it worth the wait here?

Suddenly, a strong wind blew, lifting up Segi's clothes.
That was the moment the men had been eagerly waiting for.

Her panties were exposed in front of the men, and they
became visibly excited at the sight, their desires smeared
across their faces.

\N<Man>Heh... Ma'am, you're being careless, aren't you? It's
showing.

\N<Man>You should cover up properly. You can't be showing such cute
panties to men other than your husband.

\N<Man>Or are you doing it on purpose? Waving that white ass around
to tempt us?

\N<Man>I can't stand it, ma'am. If you invited me, I'd say yes in a
heartbeat and beg for it... heh.

\N<Man>Heh, seriously nice ass. I'm envious that Yuia gets to have
it all to himself.

\N<Man>Ahh, life's unfair. While we can only enjoy peeking like
this?

\N<Man>Well, don't say that. There's a rumor that Yuia got thrown
in jail, so maybe we'll get our chance too. Let's wait
patiently, alright?

<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Rame>Segi-san...
\N<Segi>Rame-chan, you were here. Did you come to cheer on Mama...?

\N<Rame>...Yes. Mama went off to battle just a while ago. And yet...
there's nothing I can do.

\N<Rame>Even though Mama is fighting so desperately for our sake...
all I'm doing is trembling here...
\N<Segi>Rame-chan...
A

\N<Rame>Mama is fighting desperately for our sake... and yet here I
am, just trembling...

\N<Man>To win in the training tournament, strength is of course
necessary, but knowledge of your opponents is absolutely
essential. It's not so sweet that you can win through mere
brute courage.
\N<Ryuda Soldier>So you're Segi. I've heard all about you.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>As a life-prolonging measure for your husband who is
imprisoned, you are obligated to pay gold every 5 days
during the training period.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>The amount you are required to pay this time is \C[1][1000
MO]\C[0].
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$
Ready to go
Preparing
I'm not ready
準備出来ている

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... indeed. You've worked hard, continue to do so in the
future.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>However... should you stop the payments out of self-
preservation, we will simply proceed with the execution
methodically.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's this? You also do not have enough money on hand to
meet the conditions.
A
準備中
用意は出来ない
\N<Segi>...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's wrong? Silence won't start anything. Do what you must
do.
\N<Segi>Th-that is...

\N<Ryuda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you are indeed
not up to the task.

\N<Segi>W-wait, please! Just give me a little more time, I will
definitely get the money...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You have already been given ample grace period. There will
be no further leniency.
\N<Segi>But, but!!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Come now. I said you're not up to the task, but fortunately,
it seems you still have some value to us.
town1
town3
A

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Your husband Yuia's temporary exemption has already been
approved. All that's left is for you yourself to take the
stage at the military training assembly.
\N<Boy>Huh? Isn't that Riia over there?
\N<Riia>Ah...

\N<Boy>What are you doing in a place like this? It's fine to wander
around, but have you finished that assignment yet?
\N<Riia>Y-yeah... I finished it.
\N<Segi>...?
\N<Segi>You must be Fubii... Are you friends with Riia?

\N<Boy>Friends? Me and him? Ahaha, yeah, that's right. We're
friends, aren't we?
\N<Riia>Y-yeah...
\N<Segi>...
\N<Boy>I see, so you're Riia's mother. I had no idea.

\N<Boy>Riia, you're bad for not telling me sooner that you have
such a beautiful mother.
\N<Riia>Th-that's...
\N<Riia>Mom, I-I'm going to go home now, okay?
\N<Rame>Wait, Riia-chan. If that's the case, I'll come with you...
\N<Boy>Riia, aren't you forgetting to say goodbye?
\N<Riia>G-goodbye...
\N<Segi>And you? Why are you in a place like this?
\N<Boy>Heh, isn't it obvious? Today was the day of my match.

\N<Segi>A match... You're being forced to participate in the
training corps as well. And you're not much older than
Riia...

\N<Boy>Don't get me wrong, ma'am. Didn't I tell you I'm not from
this town? I joined the training corps of my own accord.
\N<Segi>Eh...!?

\N<Boy>Heh, of course I won today's match too. Even though my
opponent was an adult. It wasn't interesting at all.

\N<Segi>You joined by yourself? Why would you do something like
that...

\N<Boy>That's none of your business, ma'am. It's not good to pry
into other people's affairs, is it?

\N<Boy>Besides, I heard that you're participating in the training
corps too, right? So either you or the person you fight will
be my next opponent, right?
\N<Segi>Me... with you!?
\N<Boy>Heh, it's not surprising. Those are the rules after all.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Boy>Heh, well then. If we talk any more, you might find out my
weaknesses, so I'm off.
\N<Boy>Oh, ma'am. I forgot to say something.

\N<Boy>Heh, if I win, let me have my way with you. I don't mind if
you're older, I'm looking forward to it.
\N<Segi>Wha...!?
\N<Segi>What is he saying? He shouldn't be much older than Riia...
\N<Segi>Irime-san...

\N<Segi>Since you've returned here like this, I take it you've
safely won your match? Congratulations...

\N<Irime>Ah, thank you. That's right. Somehow I managed to survive
today as well.

\N<Segi>Rame-chan was worried about you too... It's a relief to hear
that. She was just here waiting with me a moment ago, you
know?
\N<Irime>Is that so... Well then, it's your turn next.

\N<Irime>Your enemy Hojiko is a merchant. For better or worse, he has
a calculating nature.

\N<Irime>In other words, by dangling money or profit in front of him,
there might be room for negotiation.
\N<Segi>Negotiation...?
\N<Irime>Yes, of course, but you'll need something of value for that.

\N<Irime>Or it would be convenient if such a thing could be found
lying around inside the ruins.
\N<Segi>...

<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Segi>Riia, what are you doing in a place like this...

\N<Riia>It's just a coincidence. I happened to meet Rame-chan over
there. But what about you, Mom? What brings you here?

\N<Rame>Oh, um... I'm sorry. It was me who asked Riia-chan. I felt
lonely being here by myself...
\N<Segi>...I see.

\N<Riia>So? What about you, Mom? What are you doing in a place like
this?

\N<Segi>Mom is here to... check on Irime-san. I thought maybe there
was something I could do to help.

\N<Riia>Then you're going to watch the match, right? I'll come with
you. They told us we can't go to the upper seats by
ourselves.
\N<Segi>Eh...?
A
\N<Man>...
\N<Segi>...?
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■EV発生■>
\N<Segi>Excuse me... could you let us through here?

\N<Man>Hey, Segi-san. Where are you headed? It's such a
heartwarming sight to see you out with your son.
\N<Riia>What we do is none of your business, right?
\N<Segi>Riia...
\N<Man>Oh my... Riia has become quite outspoken, hasn't he?
\N<Segi>I-I'm sorry, this child is just...
\N<Riia>...
\N<Segi>I'm truly sorry... Well then, we'll be on our way...

\N<Man>Yeah, yeah, take care, okay? The world isn't filled with
just kind people like us, you know?
\N<Riia>...
\N<Man>...
\N<Segi>...?
\N<Man>...
\N<Segi>...?
\N<Man>...
\N<Segi>...?
\N<Man>...
